channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-37084] NullPointerException occurs during handling timer of window in PyFlink
item.description:

Reported in slack channel: https://apache-flink.slack.com/archives/C065944F9M2/p1736236759968739
item.summary: NullPointerException occurs during handling timer of window in PyFlink

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The proposed solution is to move the Timer registration from the gRPC thread to the main thread.

Fixed in:

  • master via 82baf8886d27bb5a32245826dfcf180efc52cc17
  • release-1.20 via f48c15979232e963d5668284785397dd8a2abdd3
  • release-1.19 via 5fe0280bae13203ac65b3c1534a167b72534e91b
